divs: Sighting DetailsIt was 4 am in Stockport walking home from a friends with my girlfriend half way home we were watching the SARS and suddenly we noticed a flashing star we soon realised it wasn't we watch for 5 minutes as it started to move toward and away in a circular motion from another object after about 10 minutes it stared pulsating faster with an aura around the original light after about 10 more minutes it seemed to literally shoot off away from earth.
trends: There have been 14 other sightings in Manchester
There were no other sightings in Manchester on or around June 20th 2011
Summary: Pulsating light with aura around it moving quickly around another object
